description: Suou is calm and organised, and he likes order and punctuality. In fifth grade at Clamp School, he is proficient in martial arts and ancient literature. He is also the secretary for the student association of his school`s elementary division. As such, he frequently urges the association`s president, Imonoyama Nokoru, to do his paperwork. Suou is a member of the prestigious Takamura clan, known for forming bodyguards with ninja-like skills. As a Takamura, his objective in life is to protect Nokoru. He is shy about his relationship with kindergarten flautist Azuya Nagisa.
name: Takamura Suou
